#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int x1,x2,x3,x4,y1,y2,y3,y4,a=0,b=0,x=0,area=0;
		scanf("%d %d %d %d",&x1,&y1,&x2,&y2);
		scanf("%d %d %d %d",&x3,&y3,&x4,&y4);
		a=abs((x2-x1)*(y2-y1)+(x4-x3)*(y4-y3));
	    if(x4>x1&&y4>y1&&x2>x3&&y2>y3)
		b=abs((min(x2,x4)-max(x1,x3))*(min(y2,y4)-max(y1,y3)));
		area=a-b;
		printf("%d\n",area);
	}
	return 0;
}
